about_the_game:
Motherless - Season 2: Chapter 13 includes: Chapter 13 first and second half

TO ACCESS THIS DLC IN-GAME, YOU WILL REQUIRE THE PREVIOUS CHAPTER!

  • Chapter 13 is composed of 18 extra scenes with many special images, sexy scenes, and more!
  • Continue your path to becoming the new leader of this family!



Sunny is getting ready to fly back to the U.S. when Florencia shows up wanting to go with him, leaving him no choice.

How will he manage to pay attention to all the women in his life now?

content_descriptors.notes:
MOTHERLESS is a Visual Novel (VN) for adults with explicit sex scenes. Not intended for audiences under 18 years old.

The game graphically depicts alcohol, the use of violence and drug references. If you are easily offended, this one is not for you.

All sex in the game is consensual and all characters are over 18 years old.

name: Motherless - Season 2: Chapter 13 DLC

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Sunny is getting ready to fly back to the U.S. when Florencia shows up wanting to go with him, leaving him no choice.INCLUDES: CHAPTER 13 (PART 1 AND PART 2)
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America
